comment: The indexed union of connected overlapping subspaces sharing a common point is connected. This proof was automatically derived by completeusersproof from its Virtual Deduction proof counterpart ~ http://us.metamath.org/other/completeusersproof/iunconaltvd.html . As it is verified by the Metamath program, ~ iunconnALT verifies ~ http://us.metamath.org/other/completeusersproof/iunconaltvd.html . (Contributed by Alan Sare, 22-Apr-2018.)
